title: Welcome and Opening

author: Dunja Mladenić, Artificial Intelligence Laboratory, Jožef Stefan Institute

segmentation: It's my great pleasure to welcome you all here on the conference on 100 years of volunteering and 20 years of slides.
So before we really start, may I invite everyone just for a moment to close your eyes?
Take a deep breath.
And remember.
All the great people.
Who are responsible that we are here today?
Professionally and personally.
Thank you.
So what are we celebrating today?
It's a century of Alan Turing's birthday.
And 20 years anniversary of Slovenian AI SoC.
So that's the conference team as well.
So Alan Turing born in 1912.
Was English mathematician.
Logician cryptanalyst and computer scientist.
He was very influential, as we all know in development of computer science.
Providing a formalization of the concept of algorithm and computation with the Turing machine.
He is also widely considered to be father of computer science and in particular artificial intelligence.
Slovenian AI SoC.
Is Association of researchers and practitioners.
In the field of artificial intelligence in Slovenia.
We promote theoretical and applied research as well as transfer of AI technologies to industry and commercial environments.
Our Association is also a member of European Association of Artificial Intelligence.
And since we're celebrating 20 years, we were established in 1992.
I was hoping to find some pictures from the event of establishment.
I didn't manage, so I'm sorry for that.
Instead, I'll just plug in picture of a part of a group from the same year, so some of you may recognize.
Yourself, I certainly needed some time to figure out that this is me 20 years ago.
Nevertheless.
We are much bigger groups now.
And for the schedule.
This is what is in front of us today.

So you will see, we have honorary speaker to start with, and then we will interchange invited talks with the contributing talks, giving us an idea on international and national development and state of the art of artificial intelligence.
So with that, I'd like to say that the conference is open and we start.
With the first presentation.
Thank you.
